_header: As far as men ride or goon
_description: Le Bone Florence of Rome, the romance of the Chaste Empress — 2189 lines in 12-line stanzas

CULFf238.First Lines:
As ferre as men ryde or goneA more chyualrous town þen Troy
                    was oonIn londe was neuer seenNor better knyȝtes þen came of
                    hyt…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…Ihesu that boght vs on the rodeVn to hys blysse vs
                    sende
CULFf238.Attributed Title: Explicit Le bone fflorence of Rome (f. 254rb)
